A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a Star Wars film it was visually spectacular and kept me on the edge of my seat. The plot for me was enjoyable even though there was a view plotholes I would have liked to have not seen. I would have liked Snoke to have more development for his character and more of an explanation to why the resistance escape plan wasn't discussed with Poe. I enjoyed the film however and people are getting mad because it isn't the film they expected to see.Overall\, enjoyable\, shocking\, jaw dropping and visually amazing with a few errors. This takes Star Wars to a new direction and just because it isn't what some people want\, doesn't mean it is bad.
